item.title: Setting up this environment
item.author: Álvaro López Medina
item.description: Build your blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages Set up GitHub Pages Set up Hugo These are some steps to have a Hello World example of a blog using Hugo and GitHub Pages. Step 1: Install Hugo 1 sudo dnf install hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/#fedora-red-hat-and-centos Step 2: Generate repo scaffolding 1 2 3 git clone git@github.com:alvarolop/alvarolop.github.io.git cd alvarolop.github.io hugo new site . --force Step 3: Add your theme I decided to create the blog using this trendy Hugo theme: https://themes.
